item.title: Dem Rep. Kuster Leaves Congress Aiming to 'Set a Better Example'
item.description: Rep. Annie Kuster, D-N.H., announced Thursday that she is leaving Congress after more than a decade to "set a better example," The Boston Globe report...

item.title: CNBC Survey: Investors Say Trump 'Great' for Economy
item.description: A majority of investors surveyed by CNBC said President-elect Donald Trump will improve the economy after he takes office.
